ProfileInformation.Author: The Sim Pilot
ProfileInformation.Description:
Honeycomb Bravo Profile for Milviz C310R

- All Bravo LED lights are working

- AP Panel

- Throttles, Flaps, Landing Gear

- First three switches control Battery, Alternator and Magnetos

- The rest of the switches are for Nav Lights, Beacon, Taxi, Landing and Strobes combined on last switch.
